name: e10 Infotech Private Limited

idea:
The opportunity we are working on - Indian foreign tourist market is growing fastest in the world and posied to be 2X in the next 4 years. While DMC (b2b agency) model is not able to grow, offline boutique destination experts who are mushrooming out of passion, are driving growth & they are fragmented. Our aim is to consolidate these new-age offline industry experts on a platform, help them distribute these services directly to foreign tourists & enable the journey of discovery to the transaction and build a sustainable tourism model. 


Who are local experts - These are the passionate individuals or professional guides who are creating experiences like walking, cycling, village tours on history, architect, movies, local market and lot more. They are the people who appreciate their cities, places and takes pride to showcase India just like a guide but they are beyond that. 


Impact - This will create local people creating experiences and will create employment that leads to a sustainable tourism model.


Market Size - 2018 arrival 10.3 Mn visitors, $ 32 BN total market size, USD 7 BN TAM


Team - We are an amazing young team that has the diversified relevant professional pedigree and left our settled corporate life to solve this. As a team, we have more than 50 years of experience & instrumental in successfully setting up eCommerce (thomascook.in, sotc.in, icicilombard.com & timesofmoney.com) business in the past. 


What we do - We hunt for the new age authentic suppliers, who are passionate about showcasing India. We are riding on the emerging GIG economy and will be feeding for new product curation, bring uniformity through training and best practices. To market them we have made a tech platform that helps the foreign traveler to select authentic experiences & connect with the local suppliers.  

 

Journey so far - In last 3 months, we have build a comprehensive platform, theindiantrip.com (Fully functional website, content module, supplier interface, PG integration with responsive UI), Social assets & organic followers on Instagram, Twitter & FB. We have also on-boarded local experts and a range of selected experiences across India. 

 

Way forward - Raising seed round to strengthen amazing experiences and suppliers onboard, expand our content on the various destination, food, culture, monument, and showcase the variety of India. Building communities to create, consume and spread the content through social media channels & blogs.
name: TheIndianTrip
